name: Dices n' Lights
description:
Welcome to Dices n' Lights!

You are Genilson, an explorer trying to run away from an unknown monster!

Roll the dices and see if your lucky... or not! 

============================================

Tutorial

In this game there're two dices, one for Movement and the other for Action. 

First you must roll the one on the left (Movement) and then the one on the right side (Action).

Movement will make Genilson walking foward and Action will conceed dexterity buffs for him.

After that you'll automatically finish your turn and the Monster will make his moves.

This cycle will continue till you reach the exit, or the Monster reaches you!

Wish you luck!
